#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	 long long int  t,num,digit,base,deci,pw=0; cin>>t; char ch;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>num>>base;
		deci=0;pw=0;
		while(num)
		{	
			digit=num%10;  //cout<<digit<<", ";
			deci+=(digit)*pow(base,pw); pw++;  num/=10;
		}
		//cout<<endl<<deci<<endl;
		ch=(char)deci;  cout<<ch;
	}
	cout<<endl;
	return 0;
}
